summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Interlake Avenue, from North 39th Street to North 40th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; in accordance with Resolution No. 9797 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
